question: What is the name of the report that the chapter 'Impacts of 1.5ºC Global Warming on Natural and Human Systems' is a part of, and what is the title of the report?
answer: The chapter 'Impacts of 1.5ºC Global Warming on Natural and Human Systems' is part of the report 'Global Warming of 1.5°C. An IPCC Special Report on the impacts of global warming of 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels and related global greenhouse gas emission pathways, in the context of strengthening the global response to the threat of climate change, sustainable development, and efforts to eradicate poverty'.
